definitions.definition: If someone has a tendency to do or like something, they will probably do it or like it:
examples: [ + to infinitive ] His tendency to exaggerate is well known.

definitions.definition: If there is a tendency for something to happen, it is likely to happen or it often happens:
examples: There is a tendency for unemployment to rise in the summer.

definitions.definition: If there is a tendency to do something, it starts to happen more often or starts to increase:
examples: [ + to infinitive ] There is a growing tendency to regard money more highly than quality of life.
